mapper.select: select distinct sm.id,sm.parent_id,sm.name, sm.type,sm.path,sm.component, sm.perms,sm.icon,sm.sort_value, sm.status,sm.create_time, sm.update_time,sm.is_deleted from sys_menu sm inner join sys_role_menu srm on sm.id = srm.menu_id inner join sys_user_role sur on sur.role_id = srm.role_id where user_id = #{userId} and sm.status = 1 and sm.is_deleted = 0 and srm.is_deleted = 0 and sur.is_deleted = 0
